children.text: Catherine Flowers is the Texas Field Organizer for the Moms Clean Air Force. She previously served as director of community and governmental affairs for then-Louisiana Lieutenant Governor Mitch Landrieu and created the City of Houston Department of Neighborhoods under Mayor Annise Parker.
